content: this is a pattern to make a pet bed worked in the round it is seamless and worked in one piece the edge is stuffed to give a nice warm cosy bed you can make it larger simply by adding more row to the base and to the sides written instructions and also youtube tutorial cal/crochet along video http //www pookiedoodlecrafts co uk/2017/01/pet-bed-cat-or-dog-bed-crochet-tutorial html https //youtu be/dl4qaasj7le
